_comment: This is the JSON configuration file to run the GNSS positioning algorithm.

log._comment: Configuration of the Log File (Possible values: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL).

inputs._comment2: snr threshold to discard RINEX observables (compare with snr control digit). [1-4]: bad, [5:8]: good, 9: excellent

arc._comment1: Select first and last epochs in estimation arc in format YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss

inputs._comment3: Select the input data rate (in seconds). The rate must be consistent with the RINEX OBS rate. Select false to disable.

GPS._comment1: Select Tropospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - a priori Saastamoinen model
GPS._comment2: Select Ionospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - Klobuchar model, 2 - NTCM-G Model

GAL._comment0: select between INAV or FNAV navigation message
GAL._comment1: Select Tropospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - a priori Saastamoinen model
GAL._comment2: Select Ionospheric model: 0 - no model, 1 - Klobuchar model, 2 - NTCM-G Model

preprocessor._comment4: Signal strength (SNR) filter. Select value of SNR (dBHz) threshold. Select false to turn off

satellite_status._comment: whether or not to check the SV Accuracy and SV health fields of the navigation message

solver._comment2: maximum number of iterations in iterative procedure
solver._comment3: stop condition to end iterated least squares. Process ends when (RMS(i-1) - RMS(i)) / RMS(i-1) <= stop_criteria
solver._comment6: Select algorithm to compute the transmission time: 0 - geometric, 1 - pseudorange
solver._comment34: Enable / disable relativistic corrections: 0 - disable, 1 - enable
solver._comment5: Elevation filter. Select the value of minimum elevation angle to consider, in degree. Select false to turn off

output._comment: select output folder (absolute path) to store the run. Set 'default' to store in default path runs/

true_static_position._comment: True receiver coordinates with respect to ECEF frame [meters]
